generated_body: If you click on the article titled "Ex-DII walk-on worked at potato chip factory before Raiders," you can expect to read about the journey of a former Division II walk-on athlete who transitioned from sports to a job in a potato chip factory before eventually signing with the Las Vegas Raiders. Additionally, it could provide insights into how this background shaped their professional career in the NFL.
